name: Ali Raad Hussein
tagline: Freelance IT Consultant | Network & System Administrator | PMP‑Certified Project Manager
intro: IT professional with 12+ years of experience spanning network engineering, systems administration, and project leadership. Currently at Siemens Energy - Maisan, Rumaila and Shatt Al-Basrah Power Plant (Iraq), I help organizations design secure networks, modernize infrastructure, and execute projects with measurable outcomes.

highlights: Designed and implemented a secure IT network
Reduced downtime using monitoring tools (PRTG, SolarWinds)
Led IT team to upgrade infrastructure
Improved data protection via new security protocols
Managed IT operations for international clients
